component.name: RemoteBox: VirtualBox Client
component.summary: A remote client for administering VirtualBox and its guests

description.p: RemoteBox is a VirtualBox client which allows you to administer a server installation of VirtualBox and its guests over the network. Guests are launched in headless-mode which allows complete interaction with their displays from the client machine using RDP, which also supports sound and clipboard sharing. RemoteBox is compatible with VirtualBox on a server running Linux, Windows, Solaris or Mac OS X.
It supports most of the features of standard VirtualBox user interface with the advantage that all the guest resources are consumed on your server and not your client.
